name.ja: <ruby>夢<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>中<rt>ちゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>誘<rt>いざな</rt></ruby>い

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, place 1 monster from your field and 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the owner's Deck in any order.

effect.en: Take control of 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field, except a Maximum Monster. While the monster you took control of by this effect is face-up on the field, it cannot attack or activate its effects.
